spells.name: Create the Perfect Gemstone
spells.description: Creates a flawless gemstone of considerable size and beauty. The gem is real and permanent, suitable for jewelry or trade.
spells.searchText: create the perfect gemstone creates a flawless gemstone of considerable size and beauty. the gem is real and permanent, suitable for jewelry or trade. base 15 (create precious stone), +1 touch

spells.name: Wall of Protective Stone
spells.description: Creates a thick wall of solid stone that provides excellent protection. The wall is permanent until destroyed or the spell expires.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (create stone structure), +2 Voice, +3 Moon, +2 for size
spells.searchText: wall of protective stone creates a thick wall of solid stone that provides excellent protection. the wall is permanent until destroyed or the spell expires. base 10 (create stone structure), +2 voice, +3 moon, +2 for size

spells.name: Earth that Swallows
spells.description: Creates a pit in solid ground that can trap enemies. The earth opens suddenly and can be closed at the caster's will.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (create earth opening), +2 Voice, +1 Concentration, +1 for control
spells.searchText: earth that swallows creates a pit in solid ground that can trap enemies. the earth opens suddenly and can be closed at the caster's will. base 5 (create earth opening), +2 voice, +1 concentration, +1 for control

spells.name: Bridge of Eternal Stone
spells.description: Creates a magnificent stone bridge that spans great distances. The bridge is perfectly engineered and can support heavy traffic.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (create major structure), +2 Voice, +4 Year, +4 for size and complexity
spells.searchText: bridge of eternal stone creates a magnificent stone bridge that spans great distances. the bridge is perfectly engineered and can support heavy traffic. base 15 (create major structure), +2 voice, +4 year, +4 for size and complexity

spells.name: Pillar of Earth's Strength
spells.description: Causes a thick pillar of stone to rise from the earth, providing support for structures or creating an elevated platform.
spells.searchText: pillar of earth's strength causes a thick pillar of stone to rise from the earth, providing support for structures or creating an elevated platform. base 10 (create stone pillar), +2 voice, +2 sun

spells.name: Forge of Endless Metal
spells.description: Creates a magical forge that produces high-quality metal continuously. The forge burns without fuel and works metal perfectly.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (create metal source), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +1 Ignem requisite
spells.searchText: forge of endless metal creates a magical forge that produces high-quality metal continuously. the forge burns without fuel and works metal perfectly. base 15 (create metal source), +1 touch, +2 sun, +1 ignem requisite

spells.name: Crystal Cave of Wonders
spells.description: Creates a beautiful crystal cave filled with glowing gems and precious stones. The cave provides light and shelter.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (create crystal chamber), +1 Touch, +4 Year, +2 Room
spells.searchText: crystal cave of wonders creates a beautiful crystal cave filled with glowing gems and precious stones. the cave provides light and shelter. base 15 (create crystal chamber), +1 touch, +4 year, +2 room

spells.name: Mend the Shattered Stone
spells.description: Repairs damage to stone structures, welding broken pieces back together and restoring them to their original strength.
spells.searchText: mend the shattered stone repairs damage to stone structures, welding broken pieces back together and restoring them to their original strength. base 10 (repair stone), +1 touch

spells.name: Blade of Hardened Earth
spells.description: Creates a weapon from hardened earth or stone. The weapon is as sharp and durable as steel but weighs like stone.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (create simple object), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +1 for weapon quality
spells.searchText: blade of hardened earth creates a weapon from hardened earth or stone. the weapon is as sharp and durable as steel but weighs like stone. base 5 (create simple object), +1 touch, +2 sun, +1 for weapon quality

spells.name: Tower of the Earth's Bones
spells.description: Creates a magnificent stone tower complete with rooms, stairs, and defenses. The tower rises from the earth fully formed.
spells.guidelines: Base 20 (create major structure), +2 Voice, +4 Year, +3 Structure
spells.searchText: tower of the earth's bones creates a magnificent stone tower complete with rooms, stairs, and defenses. the tower rises from the earth fully formed. base 20 (create major structure), +2 voice, +4 year, +3 structure

spells.name: Gold from Lead
spells.description: Transmutes base metals into gold. The transformation appears permanent but reverts when the spell expires unless made permanent.
spells.searchText: gold from lead transmutes base metals into gold. the transformation appears permanent but reverts when the spell expires unless made permanent. base 15 (transform metal), +1 touch, +3 moon

spells.name: Quarry of Endless Stone
spells.description: Creates a quarry that continuously produces high-quality building stone. The quarry replenishes itself as stone is removed.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (create stone source), +1 Touch, +4 Year, +4 Boundary
spells.searchText: quarry of endless stone creates a quarry that continuously produces high-quality building stone. the quarry replenishes itself as stone is removed. base 15 (create stone source), +1 touch, +4 year, +4 boundary

spells.name: Stone to Soft Clay
spells.description: Transforms solid stone into soft, malleable clay that can be easily shaped by hand, then returns to stone when the spell expires.
spells.searchText: stone to soft clay transforms solid stone into soft, malleable clay that can be easily shaped by hand, then returns to stone when the spell expires. base 5 (soften stone), +1 touch, +2 sun

spells.name: Transform Lead to Gold
spells.description: Transforms base metals into precious gold. The transformation appears permanent but reverts when the spell expires unless made truly permanent.
spells.searchText: transform lead to gold transforms base metals into precious gold. the transformation appears permanent but reverts when the spell expires unless made truly permanent. base 15 (transform metal type), +1 touch, +3 moon

spells.name: Hardness of the Adamant
spells.description: Transforms any stone or metal to become as hard as diamond while retaining its original appearance and other properties.
spells.searchText: hardness of the adamant transforms any stone or metal to become as hard as diamond while retaining its original appearance and other properties. base 10 (enhance hardness), +1 touch, +2 sun

spells.name: Dust to Dust
spells.description: Transforms solid stone or metal into fine dust, causing structures to collapse and weapons to crumble into powder.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (crumble to dust), +2 Voice, +1 Perdo requisite
spells.searchText: dust to dust transforms solid stone or metal into fine dust, causing structures to collapse and weapons to crumble into powder. base 10 (crumble to dust), +2 voice, +1 perdo requisite

spells.name: Living Stone
spells.description: Transforms stone into a living creature that can move and follow simple commands while retaining its stone composition and durability.
spells.guidelines: Base 20 (animate stone), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +1 Animal requisite
spells.searchText: living stone transforms stone into a living creature that can move and follow simple commands while retaining its stone composition and durability. base 20 (animate stone), +1 touch, +2 sun, +1 animal requisite

spells.name: Blade of Virulent Flame
spells.description: Transforms a metal weapon to burn with internal fire, making it glow red-hot and deal additional fire damage without harming the wielder.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (add fire properties), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +1 Ignem requisite
spells.searchText: blade of virulent flame transforms a metal weapon to burn with internal fire, making it glow red-hot and deal additional fire damage without harming the wielder. base 15 (add fire properties), +1 touch, +2 sun, +1 ignem requisite

spells.name: Liquid Stone
spells.description: Transforms solid stone into a flowing liquid that can be poured and shaped, then solidifies when concentration ends.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (liquefy stone), +1 Touch, +1 Concentration, +1 Aquam requisite
spells.searchText: liquid stone transforms solid stone into a flowing liquid that can be poured and shaped, then solidifies when concentration ends. base 10 (liquefy stone), +1 touch, +1 concentration, +1 aquam requisite

spells.name: Curse of the Rust
spells.description: Transforms metal to become completely rusted and corroded, weakening weapons and armor or destroying metal objects entirely.
spells.searchText: curse of the rust transforms metal to become completely rusted and corroded, weakening weapons and armor or destroying metal objects entirely. base 5 (corrode metal), +2 voice, +1 aquam requisite

spells.name: Shapeshifter's Stone
spells.description: Transforms stone to become moldable like clay while retaining its strength, allowing the caster to reshape it at will through concentration.
spells.searchText: shapeshifter's stone transforms stone to become moldable like clay while retaining its strength, allowing the caster to reshape it at will through concentration. base 15 (controllable transformation), +1 touch, +1 concentration

spells.name: Earth to Air
spells.description: Transforms solid earth or stone into breathable air, creating tunnels through solid rock or making underground chambers habitable.
spells.guidelines: Base 20 (transform to air), +2 Voice, +1 Diameter, +1 Auram requisite
spells.searchText: earth to air transforms solid earth or stone into breathable air, creating tunnels through solid rock or making underground chambers habitable. base 20 (transform to air), +2 voice, +1 diameter, +1 auram requisite

spells.name: Crystal Clarity
spells.description: Transforms opaque stone into transparent crystal while maintaining its structural integrity, creating windows in stone walls.
spells.searchText: crystal clarity transforms opaque stone into transparent crystal while maintaining its structural integrity, creating windows in stone walls. base 5 (change opacity), +1 touch, +2 sun

spells.name: Rust and Ruin
spells.description: This spell causes metal objects to rust and corrode rapidly, weakening their structure. Iron weapons become brittle and may break in combat, while armor loses protective value. The corrosion is permanent unless the metal is reforged.
spells.searchText: rust and ruin this spell causes metal objects to rust and corrode rapidly, weakening their structure. iron weapons become brittle and may break in combat, while armor loses protective value. the corrosion is permanent unless the metal is reforged. base 4 (damage metal), +2 voice

spells.name: Crumble the Castle Wall
spells.description: This powerful spell causes stone walls and structures to crumble and collapse. The affected masonry develops cracks that rapidly spread until the entire structure falls apart. This spell can breach castle walls or bring down towers.
spells.searchText: crumble the castle wall this powerful spell causes stone walls and structures to crumble and collapse. the affected masonry develops cracks that rapidly spread until the entire structure falls apart. this spell can breach castle walls or bring down towers. base 4 (destroy stone), +2 voice, +3 structure

spells.name: Dissolve the Iron Bonds
spells.description: This spell completely destroys metal restraints such as shackles, chains, or manacles. The metal simply disintegrates, freeing anyone bound by such devices. The spell can also destroy metal locks and bolts.
spells.searchText: dissolve the iron bonds this spell completely destroys metal restraints such as shackles, chains, or manacles. the metal simply disintegrates, freeing anyone bound by such devices. the spell can also destroy metal locks and bolts. base 5 (destroy worked metal), +2 voice

spells.name: Pit of Swallowing Earth
spells.description: This spell causes the earth to suddenly open up, creating a deep pit that can swallow people, animals, or objects. The earth at the bottom becomes soft and muddy, making escape difficult. Those who fall in suffer damage and may become trapped.
spells.searchText: pit of swallowing earth this spell causes the earth to suddenly open up, creating a deep pit that can swallow people, animals, or objects. the earth at the bottom becomes soft and muddy, making escape difficult. those who fall in suffer damage and may become trapped. base 4 (destroy/alter earth), +2 voice, +2 room

spells.name: Shatter the Precious Gem
spells.description: This spell destroys gems, crystals, and precious stones by causing them to shatter into worthless fragments. The destruction is complete and irreversible, making this spell particularly devastating to those who store wealth in portable gems.
spells.searchText: shatter the precious gem this spell destroys gems, crystals, and precious stones by causing them to shatter into worthless fragments. the destruction is complete and irreversible, making this spell particularly devastating to those who store wealth in portable gems. base 2 (destroy small minerals), +2 voice

spells.name: Corrode the Sword's Edge
spells.description: This spell causes a metal weapon to gradually weaken and lose its effectiveness over the course of the day. The weapon becomes dull, brittle, and unreliable, suffering penalties to attack and damage rolls until it eventually becomes useless.
spells.searchText: corrode the sword's edge this spell causes a metal weapon to gradually weaken and lose its effectiveness over the course of the day. the weapon becomes dull, brittle, and unreliable, suffering penalties to attack and damage rolls until it eventually becomes useless. base 4 (weaken metal), +2 voice, +2 sun

spells.name: Turn Rock to Sand
spells.description: This spell breaks down solid rock into loose sand and gravel, destroying the structural integrity of stone formations. The affected rock loses all cohesion and becomes as loose as beach sand, useful for undermining foundations or creating obstacles.
spells.searchText: turn rock to sand this spell breaks down solid rock into loose sand and gravel, destroying the structural integrity of stone formations. the affected rock loses all cohesion and becomes as loose as beach sand, useful for undermining foundations or creating obstacles. base 10 (fundamentally alter stone), +2 voice

spells.name: Destroy the Mountain's Heart
spells.description: This devastating spell can destroy vast amounts of stone and earth across a huge area. It can level hills, create canyons, or cause landslides on a massive scale. The geological disruption affects an entire region and may trigger earthquakes.
spells.searchText: destroy the mountain's heart this devastating spell can destroy vast amounts of stone and earth across a huge area. it can level hills, create canyons, or cause landslides on a massive scale. the geological disruption affects an entire region and may trigger earthquakes. base 15 (destroy massive stone), +3 sight, +4 boundary

spells.name: Acid of the Philosopher
spells.description: This spell creates a powerful acid that can dissolve even the hardest metals and stones. The acid continues to eat through material as long as the caster concentrates, capable of dissolving locks, armor, or even stone walls given enough time.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (create destructive substance), +1 Touch, +1 Concentration, +1 Aquam requisite
spells.searchText: acid of the philosopher this spell creates a powerful acid that can dissolve even the hardest metals and stones. the acid continues to eat through material as long as the caster concentrates, capable of dissolving locks, armor, or even stone walls given enough time. base 10 (create destructive substance), +1 touch, +1 concentration, +1 aquam requisite

spells.name: Weakness of the Cracked Foundation
spells.description: This curse gradually weakens the stone foundations of a building over the course of a year. Cracks slowly spread, mortar crumbles, and the structural integrity fails. By the year's end, the building becomes unsafe and may collapse without major repairs.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (weaken stone structure), +1 Touch, +4 Year, +3 Structure
spells.searchText: weakness of the cracked foundation this curse gradually weakens the stone foundations of a building over the course of a year. cracks slowly spread, mortar crumbles, and the structural integrity fails. by the year's end, the building becomes unsafe and may collapse without major repairs. base 5 (weaken stone structure), +1 touch, +4 year, +3 structure

spells.name: Erase the Carved Inscription
spells.description: This spell erases carved inscriptions, engravings, or symbols from stone or metal surfaces. The surface becomes smooth as if the carving never existed. This can remove magical symbols, destroy evidence, or erase important inscriptions.
spells.searchText: erase the carved inscription this spell erases carved inscriptions, engravings, or symbols from stone or metal surfaces. the surface becomes smooth as if the carving never existed. this can remove magical symbols, destroy evidence, or erase important inscriptions. base 2 (alter surface), +1 touch

spells.name: The Unseen Arm
spells.description: Allows you to move a single metal object weighing up to 5 pounds as if with an invisible hand. The object moves slowly and carefully.
spells.searchText: the unseen arm allows you to move a single metal object weighing up to 5 pounds as if with an invisible hand. the object moves slowly and carefully. base 2 (move metal), +2 voice, +1 concentration

spells.name: Earth's Carbuncle
spells.description: Summons a fist-sized chunk of earth or stone from the ground to fly at a target. Does +5 damage as a ranged attack.
spells.guidelines: Base 3 (move stone), +2 Voice, +2 for forceful movement causing damage
spells.searchText: earth's carbuncle summons a fist-sized chunk of earth or stone from the ground to fly at a target. does +5 damage as a ranged attack. base 3 (move stone), +2 voice, +2 for forceful movement causing damage

spells.name: Wielding the Invisible Sling
spells.description: Continuously hurls small stones at a target. Each round, the target takes +3 damage from flying stones.
spells.searchText: wielding the invisible sling continuously hurls small stones at a target. each round, the target takes +3 damage from flying stones. base 3 (move stones), +2 voice, +1 concentration

spells.name: Hands of the Grasping Earth
spells.description: Causes the earth to grab and hold a target's feet and legs. The target cannot move and suffers -6 to physical actions.
spells.searchText: hands of the grasping earth causes the earth to grab and hold a target's feet and legs. the target cannot move and suffers -6 to physical actions. base 5 (control earth forcefully), +2 voice, +1 concentration

spells.name: Pit of the Gaping Earth
spells.description: Opens a pit 10 feet deep directly beneath a target. The pit is 5 feet across and appears instantly.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (move earth), +2 Voice, +2 for creating large opening
spells.searchText: pit of the gaping earth opens a pit 10 feet deep directly beneath a target. the pit is 5 feet across and appears instantly. base 5 (move earth), +2 voice, +2 for creating large opening

spells.name: Wall of Protecting Stone
spells.description: Raises a stone wall 6 feet high and 20 feet long from the earth. The wall provides substantial cover and protection.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (move large amounts of stone), +2 Voice, +1 Concentration, +2 for complex shaping

spells.name: Levitate
spells.description: Causes a person wearing or touching metal to rise into the air and float. The target can move horizontally at walking speed.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (move metal supporting person), +2 Voice, +1 Concentration
spells.searchText: levitate causes a person wearing or touching metal to rise into the air and float. the target can move horizontally at walking speed. base 10 (move metal supporting person), +2 voice, +1 concentration

spells.name: Calling the Odious Mineral

spells.guidelines: Base 15 (summon specific minerals), +2 Voice, +2 for long range
spells.searchText: calling the odious mineral summons a specific type of metal or mineral from up to a mile away. the material travels through earth and stone to reach you. base 15 (summon specific minerals), +2 voice, +2 for long range

spells.name: Curse of the Unruly Tongue
spells.description: All metal objects on the target's person become difficult to control - weapons slip, armor binds, and tools malfunction.

spells.name: Parting the Earth
spells.description: Creates a passage through earth and stone up to 100 paces long. The passage is 6 feet wide and 8 feet tall.

spells.name: Fist of Shattering
spells.description: Causes a stone or metal object to violently shatter or break apart. Can destroy walls, weapons, or armor.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (destroy stone/metal), +2 Voice, +2 for violent destruction
